name: Myst III: Exile
description: "The idea that someone may be linking into my study, reading all of my books, disturbs me..." <br/><br/>Experience the stunning sequel to Myst and Riven, a complex tale of betrayal and revenge that only you can successfully unravel. Myst III: Exile plunges you into an adventure so real, you'll forget it's a game.<br/><br/>- Five entirely new Ages to explore<br/>- Hours of new mysteries to uncover<br/>- Dramatic new storyline<br/>- Free-look Movement System - View 360° at every location<br/>- Rich music and riveting cinematics
